60.textMFS: <VL<T'Create functions to trace the missing three arms of this star.'><H<T'You can create one function and then adjust '><SS2<T'θ'>><T' and '><SS2<H<T'C'><SS1<T' to change its rule to trace '>>>><T'each arm.'>><T'Or you can create three functions, each with a different rule, to trace the three arms.'><T'Use a different method than you used for your first star.'><T'Is there any way to trace all five arms using only one function rule?'><T'     Describe how you traced all five of the missing arms.'>>

32.textMFS: <T'Create an original design of your own.'>
